sub_title: Freelance Editor and Proofreader at AlBo-Scio and Managing Director at InterCulturas
summary:
I am a scientist with two decades of experience in research and supervision.  
Working at the top research universities ETH Zurich and Australian National University, I developed and led projects as well as coached students in their research projects to successfully finish their thesis, gave lectures and realized practical courses. 
Now I translate my broad experience into helping others, academia and industry, in counseling and their writing of publications, thesis, or grant applications.

See also:
 Researchgate: https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Veronica_Albrecht-Borth

profile_positions.description:
I have two decades of experience in academia, supervising students at different levels in their research and writing.
I am experienced in writing and reviewing publications and grant applications.

Now I translate my knowledge in offering counseling, proofreading, and editing services for academia and industry in English and German.
profile_positions.title: Freelance Editor and Proofreader

profile_positions.description:
Today’s children face an entirely different world then we did. The world is developing into a melting pot. It is multicultural, multilingual, and rapidly changing. This brings many challenges as well as many opportunities which haven’t existed before. 
Teaching about the beauty of diversity and how to connect across differences is our first goal at InterCulturas. It always includes one crucial first step for us and all our students and participants – self-reflection. Where do I stand? What is my story? What have I experienced so far? Without becoming aware of one’s own role within society, connecting with others in a meaningful way is almost impossible.
             InterCulturas is giving people the tools to connect and support each other
To create change, education is key. InterCulturas supports the call for change by educating students and other educators about the beauty of diversity and the advantages of a diverse society.
InterCulturas wants our children to be empowered to grow into global citizens who embrace intercultural diversity.
InterCulturas helps teachers, schools, and parents to be ready to face these changes and challenges.
profile_positions.title: Managing Director

profile_positions.title: Head Plant Scientist

profile_positions.description:
SENIOR RESEARCH ASSOCIATE at Research Centre of Excellence in Plant Energy Biology

RESPONSIBILITIES
- Project lead in chloroplast biogenesis inception, planning, execution, and own publication strategy

- Supervision and coaching of PhD, master, and honour students

- Lectures and practical courses

ACHIEVEMENTS
- Identification and characterization of different novel mechanism and pathways in plants led to publications in renowned journals e.g. Plant Cell, Plant Physiology, and Plant Journal

- Theses with high or highest distinction, inspired students to continue in research

- Led encouraged and motivated students to scientific work for the research lab
profile_positions.title: Research Associate

profile_positions.description:
POSTDOCTORAL ASSISTANT in Plant Genetics
RESPONSIBILITIES	
- Project lead in chloroplast biogenesis with own experimental research and publications

- Coaching of PhD, MSc students, and technical assistant apprentices 

- Lectures and practical courses

ACHIEVEMENTS
- Initiation of a project that led to the identification of novel mutant lines and publications in The Plant Cell, Plant Molecular Biology, and MGG

- Successful research and theses of graduate students
Installation of molecular biology techniques

- Confirmed knowledge transfer
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Doctoral thesis with "Summa cum laude" (highest distinction)
I identified several knock-out mutants for genes encoding proteins involved in abiotic and biotic stress signalling which led to publications in EMBO, The Plant Cell and Plant Journal. I was also involved in teaching and supervision of undergraduate and graduate students.
profile_positions.title: Doctoral Candidate

profile_positions.description: Study of Biology with focus on Plant Biology, Ecology, Toxicology and Pharmakology, and Chemistry
